verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in those <S%H1992><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> when there was no <S%H369><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that there was <S%H1961><s%> a certain <S%H376><s%> Levite <S%H3881><s%> sojourning <S%H1481><s%> on the side <S%H3411><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> who took <S%H3947><s%> to him a concubine <S%H802><s%> <S%H6370><s%> out of Bethlehem-judah. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%>

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%> played the whore <S%H2181><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him, and went away <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> him unto <S%H413><s%> her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Bethlehem-judah, <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> and was <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> four <S%H702><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> months. <S%H2320><s%>

And her husband <S%H376><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her, to speak <S%H1696><s%> friendly <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto her, and to bring her again, <S%H7725><s%> having his servant <S%H5288><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and a couple <S%H6776><s%> of asses: <S%H2543><s%> and she brought <S%H935><s%> him into her father's <S%H1><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> and when the father <S%H1><s%> of the damsel <S%H5291><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> him, he rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him.

And his father-in-law, <S%H2859><s%> the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> retained <S%H2388><s%> him; and he abode <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him three <S%H7969><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> so they did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink, <S%H8354><s%> and lodged <S%H3885><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> on the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> when they arose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> that he rose up <S%H6965><s%> to depart: <S%H1980><s%> and the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his son-in-law, <S%H2860><s%> Comfort <S%H5582><s%> thine heart <S%H3820><s%> with a morsel <S%H6595><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> go your way. <S%H1980><s%>

And they sat down, <S%H3427><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them together: <S%H3162><s%> for the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the man, <S%H376><s%> Be content, <S%H2974><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> and tarry all night, <S%H3885><s%> and let thine heart <S%H3820><s%> be merry. <S%H3190><s%>

And when the man <S%H376><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> to depart, <S%H1980><s%> his father-in-law <S%H2859><s%> urged <S%H6484><s%> him: therefore he lodged <S%H3885><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

And he arose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> on the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to depart: <S%H1980><s%> and the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father <S%H1><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Comfort <S%H5582><s%> thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> I pray thee. <S%H4994><s%> And they tarried <S%H4102><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> afternoon, <S%H5186><s%> <S%H3117><s%> and they did eat <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them.

And when the man <S%H376><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> to depart, <S%H1980><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and his servant, <S%H5288><s%> his father-in-law, <S%H2859><s%> the damsel's <S%H5291><s%> father, <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> draweth <S%H7503><s%> toward evening, <S%H6150><s%> I pray you <S%H4994><s%> tarry all night: <S%H3885><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> groweth to an end, <S%H2583><s%> lodge <S%H3885><s%> here, <S%H6311><s%> that thine heart <S%H3824><s%> may be merry; <S%H3190><s%> and tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> get you early <S%H7925><s%> on your way, <S%H1870><s%> that thou mayest go <S%H1980><s%> home. <S%H168><s%>

But the man <S%H376><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> tarry that night, <S%H3885><s%> but he rose up <S%H6965><s%> and departed, <S%H1980><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> over against <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5227><s%> Jebus, <S%H2982><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> and there were with <S%H5973><s%> him two <S%H6776><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%> saddled, <S%H2280><s%> his concubine <S%H6370><s%> also was with <S%H5973><s%> him.

And when they <S%H1992><s%> were by <S%H5973><s%> Jebus, <S%H2982><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> was far <S%H3966><s%> spent; <S%H7286><s%> and the servant <S%H5288><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his master, <S%H113><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> and let us turn in <S%H5493><s%> into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> of the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> and lodge <S%H3885><s%> in it.

And his master <S%H113><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, We will not <S%H3808><s%> turn aside <S%H5493><s%> hither into <S%H413><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of a stranger, <S%H5237><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> we will pass over <S%H5674><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his servant, <S%H5288><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us draw near <S%H7126><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of these places <S%H4725><s%> to lodge all night, <S%H3885><s%> in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> or <S%H176><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%>

And they passed on <S%H5674><s%> and went their way; <S%H1980><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%> went down <S%H935><s%> upon them when they were by <S%H681><s%> Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> which <S%H834><s%> belongeth to Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

And they turned aside <S%H5493><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> and to lodge <S%H3885><s%> in Gibeah: <S%H1390><s%> and when he went in, <S%H935><s%> he sat him down <S%H3427><s%> in a street <S%H7339><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> for there was no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that took <S%H622><s%> them into his house <S%H1004><s%> to lodging. <S%H3885><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> an old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> his work <S%H4639><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> which <S%H3676><s%> was also of mount <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in Gibeah: <S%H1390><s%> but the men <S%H376><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> were Benjamites. <S%H1145><s%>

And when he had lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> he saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> a wayfaring <S%H732><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in the street <S%H7339><s%> of the city: <S%H5892><s%> and the old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Whither <S%H4480><s%> <S%H575><s%> goest <S%H1980><s%> thou? and whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> comest <S%H935><s%> thou?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, We <S%H587><s%> are passing <S%H5674><s%> from Bethlehem-judah <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> the side <S%H3411><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> from thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> am I: <S%H595><s%> and I went <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Bethlehem-judah, <S%H1035><s%> <S%H3063><s%> but I <S%H589><s%> am now going <S%H1980><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and there is no <S%H369><s%> man <S%H376><s%> that receiveth <S%H622><s%> me to house. <S%H1004><s%>

Yet there is <S%H3426><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> provender <S%H4554><s%> for our asses; <S%H2543><s%> and there is <S%H3426><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and wine <S%H3196><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> for me, and for thy handmaid, <S%H519><s%> and for the young man <S%H5288><s%> which is with <S%H5973><s%> thy servants: <S%H5650><s%> there is no <S%H369><s%> want <S%H4270><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> thing. <S%H1697><s%>

And the old <S%H2205><s%> man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Peace <S%H7965><s%> be with thee; howsoever <S%H7535><s%> let all <S%H3605><s%> thy wants <S%H4270><s%> lie upon <S%H5921><s%> me; only <S%H7535><s%> lodge <S%H3885><s%> not <S%H408><s%> in the street. <S%H7339><s%>

So he brought <S%H935><s%> him into his house, <S%H1004><s%> and gave provender <S%H1101><s%> unto the asses: <S%H2543><s%> and they washed <S%H7364><s%> their feet, <S%H7272><s%> and did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Now as they <S%H1992><s%> were making their hearts merry, <S%H3190><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3820><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> certain <S%H376><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Belial, <S%H1100><s%> beset the house round about, <S%H5437><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1004><s%> and beat <S%H1849><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the door, <S%H1817><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the master <S%H1167><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> the old man, <S%H2205><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> thine house, <S%H1004><s%> that we may know <S%H3045><s%> him.

And the man, <S%H376><s%> the master <S%H1167><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Nay, <S%H408><s%> my brethren, <S%H251><s%> nay, I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> do not so wickedly; <S%H7489><s%> <S%H408><s%> seeing that <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> mine house, <S%H1004><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> folly. <S%H5039><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> here is my daughter <S%H1323><s%> a maiden, <S%H1330><s%> and his concubine; <S%H6370><s%> them I will bring out <S%H3318><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> and humble <S%H6031><s%> ye them, and do <S%H6213><s%> with them what seemeth <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto you: but unto this <S%H2088><s%> man <S%H376><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> so <S%H2063><s%> vile <S%H5039><s%> a thing. <S%H1697><s%>

But the men <S%H376><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> to him: so the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H2388><s%> his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and brought her forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H2351><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them; and they knew <S%H3045><s%> her, and abused <S%H5953><s%> her all <S%H3605><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning: <S%H1242><s%> and when the day <S%H7837><s%> began to spring, <S%H5927><s%> they let her go. <S%H7971><s%>

Then came <S%H935><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> in the dawning <S%H6437><s%> of the day, <S%H1242><s%> and fell down <S%H5307><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the man's <S%H376><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> her lord <S%H113><s%> was, till <S%H5704><s%> it was light. <S%H216><s%>

And her lord <S%H113><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and opened <S%H6605><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> his way: <S%H1870><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the woman <S%H802><s%> his concubine <S%H6370><s%> was fallen down <S%H5307><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> and her hands <S%H3027><s%> were upon <S%H5921><s%> the threshold. <S%H5592><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Up, <S%H6965><s%> and let us be going. <S%H1980><s%> But none <S%H369><s%> answered. <S%H6030><s%> Then the man took <S%H3947><s%> her up upon <S%H5921><s%> an ass, <S%H2543><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and got <S%H1980><s%> him unto his place. <S%H4725><s%>

And when he was come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a knife, <S%H3979><s%> and laid hold <S%H2388><s%> on his concubine, <S%H6370><s%> and divided <S%H5408><s%> her, together with her bones, <S%H6106><s%> into twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> her into all <S%H3605><s%> the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it was <S%H1961><s%> so, that all <S%H3605><s%> that saw <S%H7200><s%> it said, <S%H559><s%> There was no <S%H3808><s%> such <S%H2063><s%> deed done <S%H1961><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> from the day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> consider <S%H7760><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> it, take advice, <S%H5779><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> your minds.
